SEARCH
Package fr.simplon.oxosondages_service.controller

Class SondageController

java.lang.Object
fr.simplon.oxosondages_service.controller.SondageController
@RestController public class SondageController extends Object
The SondageController class defines the REST endpoints for the Sondage resource. It provides methods for retrieving, creating, updating and deleting sondages.

  • Method Details

    • getSondages

      @GetMapping("/rest/sondages") public List<Sondage> getSondages()
      Retrieves a list of all sondages from the database.
      Returns:
      A List of Sondage objects.

    • getSurveyDetails

      @GetMapping("/rest/sondages/{id}") public Sondage getSurveyDetails(@PathVariable Long id) throws NoSuchElementException
      Retrieves the details of a specific sondage.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the sondage to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Sondage object with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no sondage exists with the specified ID.

    • addSurvey

      @PostMapping("/rest/sondages") public Sondage addSurvey(@RequestBody Sondage newSurvey)
      Creates a new sondage.
      Parameters:
      newSurvey - The Sondage object to create.
      Returns:
      The newly created Sondage object.

    • updateSurvey

      @PutMapping("/rest/sondages/{id}") public Sondage updateSurvey(@RequestBody Sondage newSurvey, @PathVariable Long id)
      Updates an existing sondage with new values.
      Parameters:
      newSurvey - The Sondage object containing the new values.
      id - The ID of the sondage to update.
      Returns:
      The updated Sondage object.

    • deleteSurvey

      @DeleteMapping("/rest/sondages/{id}") public void deleteSurvey(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a sondage with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the sondage to delete.
